musicAcademy.title: Live Instrument Classes
musicAcademy.description: Learn guitar, piano, drums, and more with live, interactive sessions guided by expert musicians. Our hands-on teaching method helps you build real-world skills in a fun and engaging way.

musicAcademy.title: Real-Time Feedback
musicAcademy.description: Get immediate feedback during practice and assessments. Our instructors monitor your progress and provide personalized suggestions so you can improve faster and more effectively.

musicAcademy.title: Performance Tracking
musicAcademy.description: Track your learning journey through regular assessments, progress dashboards, and recorded sessions. Stay motivated and see how far you've come with every note you master.

musicAcademy.title: Collaborative Band Practice
musicAcademy.description: Join virtual or in-person group sessions to rehearse with fellow students. Learn teamwork, timing, and musical synergy as you prepare for student concerts and live showcases.
